definition: towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: The first of the airliners winged westwards and home.
sentences.chinese: 第一架班機向西飛回了家。

sentences.english: The family moved west, to the city of Cincinnati, on the Ohio River.
sentences.chinese: 這家人繼續向西，來到俄亥俄河畔的辛辛那提。

sentences.english: Thee typhoon is moving westward at a speed of 20 kilometers per hour.
sentences.chinese: 颱風電母以時速20公里的速度向西而去。

sentences.english: When turning toward the west, they both turned their heads to look left as if by a prior agreement vacantly.
sentences.chinese: 向西拐彎的時候，兩人不約而同地向左轉頭看了看。

sentences.english: So Peter looked west towards Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 因此彼得向西打起了瑞典的主意。

sentences.english: The army was in retreat to the west.
The much larger North American plate moves westward relative to the Caribbean plate.
sentences.chinese: 面積更大的北美板塊向西移動靠近加勒比海板塊。

sentences.english: I drove out west with your mother one time before you was born.
sentences.chinese: 在你出生之前，我有一次和你媽媽向西開過。

sentences.english: The road ranges westward from the road.
sentences.chinese: 這條湖由湖邊向西延伸。

sentences.english: First the ship turned north , then suddenly to the west again .
sentences.chinese: 那船先是轉向北方，然後又忽然向西駛去。

sentences.english: General macarthur was working westward along the north coast of new guinea .
sentences.chinese: 麥克阿瑟將軍正在沿着新幾內亞北岸向西進軍。

sentences.english: Kony was later pushed even further west in the Central African Republic.
sentences.chinese: 科尼後來甚至向西逃竄至中非共和國。

sentences.english: That radiation drifted westward, across what was then Soviet Russia, toward Europe.
sentences.chinese: 輻射塵向西蔓延，跨越了整個俄羅斯，直指歐洲。

sentences.english: Sail west to lands of Kalimdor.
sentences.chinese: 向西航行到卡里姆多大陸。

sentences.english: The brothers gestured silently and set off in a westerly direction.
sentences.chinese: 溫氏兄弟打個手勢，也不說話，向西便行。

sentences.english: Just cross the street and take a west - bind No. 4 bus to the museum.
sentences.chinese: 到街對面乘坐向西走的4路汽車去博物館。

definition: west/west side/western part/to the west of
north/north side/northern part/to the north of
east/east side/eastern part/to the east of
south/south side/southern part/to the south of
Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
